## General Comments {-}

- All class sessions are scheduled from **8:30 to 11:00 AM** via Zoom. 
    - Classes 01, 14 and 15 will occur during that 2.5 hour period.
    - Classes 02 - 13 will include recorded materials from Dr. Love provided in advance of each class session, with actual class sessions held over Zoom from 9:30 AM to 10:45 AM, with the Zoom session open from 9:15 AM until 11 AM.
- All times listed anywhere on this page refer to **US Eastern Time**.
- The Zoom link for each class will be [available on Canvas](https://canvas.case.edu) in the Zoom section. Zoom recordings will also be posted to [Canvas](https://canvas.case.edu).
- Links to Class sessions and Assignments will appear here as the materials become available.
